gameList.name: Scythe
gameList.description: Lead an Eastern European country to glory as you build mechs, grow your people and fight for control of the Factory in a steampunk world. Each nation has their own special powers!

gameList.name: Puerto Rico
gameList.description: Build, farm and trade as colonial governors in Puerto Rico. Sell boatloads of cheap corn or small batches of expensive coffee while also blocking your opponents from farming and building!

gameList.name: Agricola
gameList.description: Live a life as a medieval farmer. Plant crops, raise animals, raise children and build the best farm that you can! Play occupations like the Woodcutter, Maid or Jester to help!

gameList.name: Caverna
gameList.description: From the maker of Agricola- farming, animal raising, building, mining and more... now with dwarves! Go on adventures, bring back loot and try to be the best dwarven family that you can!

gameList.name: Dominion (including Intrigue)
gameList.description: Create an empire from a simple hand of coins. Buy cards that will help you grow, and then play them later. Make incredible combos that awe your friends! And don't forget to curse your foes...

gameList.name: Settlers of Catan
gameList.description: Trade Build Settle. Classic game of rolling for resources, offering trades and building roads/cities. Have fun stealing from your opponents and try to be the one with the longest road!

gameList.name: Axis & Allies: 1942 Second Edition
gameList.description: Do you like Risk? This is Risk on steroids. Control the major powers of WW2: USA, United Kingdom and Russia vs. Germany and Japan. Battle it out using tanks, planes, battleships and more!

gameList.name: Tichu
gameList.description: Grab a partner and play Tichu against another pair. It's similar to bridge or Big 2. Alternate playing cards/hands of increasing size. Try to get rid of all your cards!

gameList.name: Race for the Galaxy (including The Gathering Storm)
gameList.description: Build the best star empire out of the cards you keep drawing. Settle alien words, invade hostile planets, build majestic mega-structures and produce exotic goods.

gameList.name: Texas Hold'em
gameList.description: The most popular version of poker, anyone can win a hand. Bluff (or luck out) your way to wins while making people sweat as you call 'all-in'! Don't worry, we won't be playing with real money.

gameList.name: Mafia/Werewolf
gameList.description: The classic traitor game. The townsfolk have one or two enemies in their midst... can they figure out who it is before they're all eliminated? Note: you will need one person to run the game.

gameList.name: Codenames: Pictures
gameList.description: Split into two teams. Arrange a 3x5 grid of abstract pictures on the table. Each team has an appointed spymaster, who must get their team to guess their team's pictures with only ONE WORD.

gameList.name: Taboo: The classic game of unspeakable fun!
gameList.description: Split into two teams. Each team sends up one person at a time to get their team to guess a particular word on a card. However, certain words are banned and cannot be used to describe it!

gameList.name: Sushi Go!
gameList.description: Draw pieces of sushi (cards) and try to make complete rolls or sashimi. Pass on what you don't want, but be careful not to help your foes! Dip your nigiri in wasabi to triple its value!

gameList.name: Table tennis (ping-pong)
gameList.description: Grab paddles, whack the ball at each other, blame your teammate when you lose :-D

gameList.name: Deception: Murder in Hong Kong
gameList.description: Mafia, but MUCH better! All of you are investigators, but one of you is also a murderer. Can the forensic scientist help the investigators figure out who did it before time runs out?

gameList.name: Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes
gameList.description: One of you sees a bomb full of puzzles to solve. The other has the solutions, but can't see the bomb. Can you work together to defuse it?

gameList.name: Nintendo Switch (Smash Bros, Mario Kart, Overcooked, Mario Party, Super Mario Bros. Deluxe
gameList.description: Pick a game and play on our new TVs!
